titles.title: To designate the information center at Canaveral National Seashore as the "T.C. Wilder, Jr., Canaveral National Seashore Information Center".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Designates the information center at Canaveral National Seashore, located approximately nine miles south of New Smyrna Beach, Florida, on Highway A1A, as the T.C. Wilder, Jr., Canaveral National Seashore Information Center.
